name: Timetable Generator
short_description:
Manages student, lecturers, venues, periods and courses. Time tables created from a seed of periods and linked courses. Iteration is performed on created time tables under the venue, lecturer and student contexts reducing infringements.

For details on how TTGen works, see files/res/ttgen-manual.pdf.

TTGen not yet supporting your favourite database? Check out DataBox (https://sourceforge.net/projects/databox/).
Some of the database handling code in
TTGen came from DataBox! It's an easy hack!
